head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DELLOVA, DR. LOUIS A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DELLOVA, DR. LOUIS A.

block.p: DELLOVA--Dr. Louis A. Devoted husband of the late Madeline, beloved father of Gerard and Carole. Loving brother of William and Eugene. In lieu of flowers donations can be made to Parkinsons Disease Association and American Heart Association. Reposing Scarpaci Funeral Home, 1401 86th St, Brooklyn. Viewing Sunday and Monday 2-5 and 7-9:30 until Tuesday 9am. Mass at St. Francis Cabrini Church, 9:45am.
